titleStmt.title: The spiritual year, or, Devout contemplations digested into distinct arguments for every month in the year and for every week in that month.
Año espiritual. English
titleStmt.author: Palafox y Mendoza, Juan de, 1600-1659.

notesStmt.note: Translation contains additions and modifications of Palafox's text. Cf. Palau y Dulcet.
Written by Juan de Palafox y Mendoza. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
